paper_title: MROS: A framework for robot self-adaptation
abstract: Self-adaptation can be used in robotics to increase system robustness and reliability. This work describes the Metacontrol method for self-adaptation in robotics. Particularly, it details how the MROS (Metacontrol for ROS Systems) framework implements and packages Metacontrol, and it demonstrate how MROS can be applied in a navigation scenario where a mobile robot navigates in a factory floor.
